body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

Invoke-Command {get-item *} -VMName win10 -Credential he

### Expected behavior

```console
目录: C:\Users\he\Documents


Mode                 LastWriteTime         Length Name                                                                 PSComputerName
----                 -------------         ------ ----                                                                 --------------
d-----         2021/10/3     13:18                Camtasia                                                             win10
d-----        2021/11/12      3:56                Camtasia Studio                                                      win10
-a----         2021/9/12     23:10           3738 21test.ps1                                                           win10
```


### Actual behavior

```console
PowerShell credential request
Enter your credentials.
Password for user he: ******


    Directory: C:\Users\he\Documents

Mode                 LastWriteTime         Length Name                               PSComputerName
----                 -------------         ------ ----                               --------------
                                                                                     win10
                                                                                     win10
                                                                                     win10
                                                                                     win10
```


### Error details

```console
PowerShell Credential Request: Windows PowerShell 凭据请求
Warning: A script or application on the remote computer WIN10 is requesting your credentials. Enter your credentials only if you trust the remote computer and the application or script
that is requesting them.

输入你的凭据。
Password for user he: ******

Invoke-Command : Windows PowerShell 的 Hyper-V 模块在此计算机上不可用。
所在位置 行:1 字符: 1
+ Invoke-Command {get-item *} -VMName win10 -Credential he
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : NotInstalled: (:) [Invoke-Command], ArgumentException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : HyperVModuleNotAvailable,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.InvokeCommandCommand
```


### Environment data

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.4
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.4
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.19043
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.body:
Yes, I can reproduce this problem.
This problem only exists on powershell 6, 7.
I think this is a compatibility issue between [powershell core version] and [hyper-v direct].

**I share with you two solutions：**
It can be solved by calling powershell.exe in pwsh.exe.
You can also use the powershell framework 【kasini3000】  resolved.
【kasini3000】written by me, open source, free, and cross-platform, that supports win/Linux nodes instead of hypverv direct.
